StreamsScalaGenerationConfig - Class in org.apache.streams.plugins
Configures StreamsScalaSourceGenerator.
StreamsScalaGenerationConfig() - Constructor for class org.apache.streams.plugins.StreamsScalaGenerationConfig
 
StreamsScalaSourceGenerator - Class in org.apache.streams.plugins
Embed within your own java code

StreamsScalaGenerationConfig config = new StreamsScalaGenerationConfig(); config.setTargetDirectory("target/generated-sources/scala"); config.setTargetPackage("com.example"); StreamsScalaSourceGenerator generator = new StreamsScalaSourceGenerator(config); generator.run();
